      • BlockHeader

        @ApiAudience.Private
public BlockHeader(BytesValue chainId,
                                        BlockHash previousHash,
                                        long blockNumber,
                                        long timestamp,
                                        Hash rootHash,
                                        Hash txRootHash,
                                        Hash receiptRootHash,
                                        long confirmsCount,
                                        BytesValue publicKey,
                                        AccountAddress coinbaseAccount,
                                        Signature sign)
        BlockHeader constructor.
        Parameters:
        chainId - a chain identifier
        previousHash - a hash of previous block
        blockNumber - a block number
        timestamp - a creation time stamp
        rootHash - a hash of root of block merkle tree
        txRootHash - a hash of root of transaction merkle tree
        receiptRootHash - a number of blocks this block is able to confirm
        confirmsCount - a number of blocks this block is able to confirm
        publicKey - a block producer's public key
        coinbaseAccount - a address of account to receive fees
        sign - a block producer's signature of BlockHeader
